name: Act of War: High Treason

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Act of War - High Treason/ActOfWar_HighTreason.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select gog setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Act of War - High Treason/ActOfWar_HighTreason.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /NOCANCEL /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
